mapper.select: SELECT year(base_date) as year,sex as sex, count(distinct company_social_security.social_security_card) as person_num FROM company_social_security join person on company_social_security.social_security_card = person.social_security_card ${financial} group by year,sex order by year,sex

select year(base_date) as "year", case when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>50) then "50岁以上" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>40) then "40岁--50岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>30) then "30岁--40岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>25) then "25岁--30岁" when (year(base_date)-year(birthday)>22) then "22岁--25岁" else "18岁--22岁" end as "age", count(distinct person.social_security_card) as "person_num" from company_social_security inner join person on company_social_security.social_security_card=person.social_security_card ${financial} group by year,age order by year,age

SELECT financial_type as financial_type, sum(social_insurance_base)/count(company_social_security.social_security_card) as base FROM company_social_security join person on company_social_security.social_security_card = person.social_security_card ${year} group by financial_type order by base DESC
SELECT financial_type as financial_type FROM company_social_security group by financial_type
